column5: Has anyone on the board fished out of Deer horn lodge on Cabonga res. and care to report on the fishing and the lake level? Our group took several trips there when the fishing was very good.

We were up there the 3rd week of June. Fishing was off and on due to the late ice out this year. Reservoir was the highest I've seen it. Gravel road in was in awesome shape. Hope you have a good trip.
